/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings that line the street. These structures are predominantly white and gray, punctuated by occasional red and blue accents that add a splash of color to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow on the scene. The street itself is lined with trees and lampposts, adding a touch of greenery to the concrete jungle. Cars can be seen driving on the road, going about their daily routines. The image is a snapshot of urban life in Beijing, showcasing the city's architectural style and the vibrancy of its streets.
